abstract: National right for same-sex marriage raises question about  domestic partner benefits; some companies are expected to tell employees they must marry within certain time frame, or lose partner's health coverage.
lead_paragraph: With same-sex marriage now a right, some companies are likely to deliver what feels like an ultimatum: Marry within a certain time frame, or lose your partner’s health care coverage.

headline.main: Fate of Domestic Partner Benefits in Question After Marriage Ruling
headline.print_headline: With Marriage a Right, Domestic Partner Benefits Come Into Question

snippet: With same-sex marriage now a right, some companies are likely to deliver what feels like an ultimatum: Marry within a certain time frame, or lose your partner’s health care coverage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
